linkInput.title: Remix Your Content
linkInput.subtitle: Paste a link from DouYin, XiaoHongShu, Bilibili, or Kuaishou to automatically generate analysis and new copy.

linkInputHeader.pasteHint: Please paste a valid link first

inputArea.placeholder: Paste a link or describe what you want to create...

summarize.label: Summarize
summarize.subtitle: Summarize
summarize.prefill: Extract key points from this content
summarize.description: Quickly grasp core points, save reading time

analyze.label: Deep Analysis
analyze.subtitle: Deep Analysis
analyze.prefill: Deep analyze the creation techniques of this content
analyze.description: Deconstruct creation techniques from a teaching perspective

template.label: Template
template.subtitle: Template Learning
template.prefill: Extract reusable templates from this content
template.description: Extract reusable templates for your original topics

style_explore.label: Style Explore
style_explore.subtitle: Style Explore
style_explore.prefill: Explore different expression styles of this content
style_explore.description: Explore different styles and perspectives on the same topic

progress.webpageLink: Video link is a webpage URL, skipping transcription

emptyState.title: Remix AI Studio
emptyState.subtitle: Paste a viral link to decode the success formula and inspire original content

chatFooter.placeholder: Start chatting anytime, or paste a link for analysis...
chatFooter.placeholderWithUrl: Link detected, select analysis mode and send

settings.title: Settings
settings.cookiesDesc: Manage platform login cookies for content fetching
settings.cookiesPlaceholder: Paste cookies string copied from browser...
settings.remarkPlaceholder: Optional, e.g.: Main account, Backup account...
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete cookies for this platform?
settings.noCookies: No cookies yet, click button above to add

mediaAi.voiceCloneDesc: Clone from uploaded audio, live recording, or first 30s from video
mediaAi.avatarCloneDesc: Clone from uploaded video, live recording, or first 30s from video
mediaAi.ttsDesc: Convert script text to speech using cloned voice or existing voiceId
mediaAi.lipsyncDesc: Generate lipsync video from uploaded/url video with audio or script TTS
mediaAi.title: Title
mediaAi.autoSentenceEmotion: Auto detect sentence emotion and apply tags
mediaAi.autoSentenceBreaks: Auto detect tone/effect/pause points inside long sentences
mediaAi.videoUrlPlaceholder: Enter video URL (audio clip will be extracted)
mediaAi.avatarVideoUrlPlaceholder: Enter video URL (video clip will be extracted)
mediaAi.recordingUnsupported: Recording is not supported in this browser. Use latest Chrome/Edge/Safari
mediaAi.recordingVideoUnsupported: Recording is not supported in this browser. Use latest Chrome/Edge/Safari
mediaAi.noVoices: No cloned voices yet. Please set up in Settings.
mediaAi.noAvatars: No cloned avatars yet. Please set up in Settings.
mediaAi.ttsSpeedHint: 0.5x is slower, 1.0x is normal, 2.0x is faster
mediaAi.ttsTagRuleEmotion: Emotion tags are auto-applied at sentence start
mediaAi.ttsTagRuleTone: Tone tags can be placed anywhere, multi-select supported
mediaAi.ttsTagRuleEffect: Effect tags can be placed anywhere, multi-select supported
mediaAi.tagLibraryHint: Click a tag to insert it at the current cursor position
mediaAi.detectExpressionTags: Detect tone and long-sentence expression habits
mediaAi.taggedTextPlaceholder: Tagged text will appear here for editing

insightModes.title: Analysis Modes
insightModes.desc: Manage and customize content analysis modes, configure System Prompt
insightModes.modeKeyHint: Unique identifier, lowercase letters, numbers and underscores only
insightModes.labelRequired: Please enter names in both languages
insightModes.promptPlaceholder: Enter the System Prompt for this mode...
insightModes.noModes: No modes yet, click button above to add
insightModes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this mode?

llmConfig.title: LLM Configuration
llmConfig.desc: Manage LLM provider configs, supports OpenAI compatible APIs, Anthropic, DeepSeek, etc.
llmConfig.descriptionPlaceholder: Optional, describe the purpose of this config
llmConfig.noConfigs: No configs yet, click button above to add
llmConfig.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this config?

landing.heroTitle: Decode Viral Content, Inspire Your Creativity
landing.heroSubtitle: Paste links from Xiaohongshu, Douyin, Bilibili, or Kuaishou. AI analyzes content structure, extracts techniques, and generates creative inspiration
landing.featuresSubtitle: From content parsing to creative generation, AI-powered throughout

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform Support
multiPlatform.description: Support Xiaohongshu, Douyin, Bilibili, Kuaishou and more. Parse videos and articles with one click

aiAnalysis.title: AI Smart Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Deep analysis of viral content's techniques, structure, emotional hooks, and success factors

creativeRemix.title: Creative Inspiration
creativeRemix.description: Generate reusable templates and original content ideas based on analysis results

landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Simple three steps to unlock your AI creative assistant

step1.title: Paste Link
step1.description: Copy any platform content link and paste it into the input

step2.title: AI Analysis
step2.description: AI extracts content and analyzes techniques and success factors

step3.title: Get Inspiration
step3.description: Get reusable templates and original creative ideas

landing.ctaSubtitle: Sign up free and experience the power of AI creative assistant
